CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sales Team relative to Management Team?
SRP.A: Sales Team is {below} Management Team in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Management Team relative to Administrative Support?
SRP.A: Management Team is {above} Administrative Support in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sales Team relative to Human Resources?
SRP.A: Sales Team is {below} Human Resources in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total employee satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Management Team}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total employee satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Human Resources}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Administrative Support's maximum Employee Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Administrative Support's maximum Employee Satisfaction is in {1967}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Human Resources's maximum Employee Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Human Resources's maximum Employee Satisfaction is in {1967}.

NC.Q: Between 1976 and 1978, was the average total Employee Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1966 and 1977?
NC.A: The average total employee satisfaction between 1976 and 1978 was {higher} than between 1966 and 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1966 and 1977, did the total Employee Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total employee satisfaction between 1966 and 1977 was {larger} than between 1970 and 1978.

NC.Q: Was the total Employee Satisfaction in 1971 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The total employee satisfaction in 1971 was {lower} than in 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1971 and 1975, was the average total Employee Satisfaction higher or lower than between 1973 and 1977?
NC.A: The average total employee satisfaction between 1971 and 1975 was {lower} than between 1973 and 1977.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Management Team} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Administrative Support and Sales Team first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Administrative Support and Sales Team first exchanged leading positions in {1967}.
